
## Laparoscopy

:::::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
-   Some stomach cancers can spread inside the abdomen
-   Areas of spread can be very small (grain of rice)
-   Laparoscopy can detect spread inside the abdomen
:::

## Laparoscopy

:::::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
A laparoscopy is performed under a general anesthetic.

-   Several incisions 1/4" long
-   A telescope is inserted to look inside the abdominal cavity.
-   Biopsies can be performed.
:::
